channel.title: Where to start
channel.description:
Well i recently found a mmo written in java and i would like to experiment with editing the client and doing other things along that line. I am also pretty sure it doest have any packet protection so i would like to work on editing packets too. However, i dont know where to start or exactly what to do. I was wondering if any of you had any suggestions on what to do or could help me with this.
For example what would i have to do to change the title of the game.
Im new to this and would really appreciate the help. I am also not asking you to do all of the work for me but to give me some pointers and where to start from.
Thanks in advance, Avalanche

item.title: Where to start
item.dc:creator: @shangtsung1 shangtsung1
item.description:
@shangtsung1 wrote:

change the value of _amount ?

Read full topic

item.title: Where to start
item.dc:creator: @Avalanche Avalanche
item.description:
@Avalanche wrote:

[code]package com.threerings.piracy.item.client;

import com.rc.retroweaver.runtime.Autobox;
import com.samskivert.text.a;
import com.threerings.media.tile.UniformTileSet;
import com.threerings.piracy.client.P;
import com.threerings.piracy.util.b;

// Referenced classes of package com.threerings.piracy.item.client:
// ItemContainer

public class PoeContainer extends ItemContainer
{

protected int _amount;

public PoeContainer(b b1)
{
    super(b1);
}

public final void a(int i)
{
    _amount = i;
    a();
}

protected final void a()
{
    UniformTileSet uniformtileset = P.b.a("media/yohoho/icons/items/poe.png", 37, 39);
    byte byte0;
    if(_amount >= 2000)
    {
        byte0 = 2;
    } else
    if(_amount >= 1000)
    {
        byte0 = 1;
    } else
    {
        byte0 = 0;
    }
    _icon = uniformtileset.getTileMirage(byte0);
    String s = _ctx.d(com.samskivert.text.a.a("client.money", com.samskivert.text.a.b("m.poe", new Object[] {
        Autobox.valueOf(_amount)
    })));
    setToolTipText(s);
}

}
[/code]

That is some obfuscated code that has something to do with money. By the way the money is called poe. Im trying to figure out if there is anyway i can edit it so that it thinks i have 1 million poe or something like that. This is obviously client side but if information about money is kept client side it can be edited right?

if it would help to see any other classes just tell me

Read full topic
